home.title: Home
home.desc: A passionate web and game developer, driven by a lifelong fascination with technology and the thrill of problem-solving. I find immense joy in creating intuitive, dynamic user experiences and captivating game environments.

about.title: About me
about.para1: I am a web and game developer based in the Greater Toronto Area. I have a passion for creating intuitive, dynamic user experiences and captivating game environments. I am a graduate of the Game Development program at George Brown College, and I am currently working as a freelance web developer.
about.para2: I am a lifelong learner, and I am always looking for new opportunities to expand my skillset. I am currently learning React, and I am looking forward to learning more about the MERN stack.
about.para3: When I'm not coding, I enjoy playing video games, reading, and spending time with my family.

tls.title: The Last Stand
tls.desc: Proof of concept for a multiplayer smashlike game

boids.desc: A Boids program that uses steering behaviors to simulate flocking movement.

magix.desc: A multiplayer card game, akin to Hearthstone, that interfaces with a database and a server's API to retrieve and display the game's current state.

textanalyzer.title: Text Analyzer
textanalyzer.desc: Program that analyzes text and searches for synonyms.

fsm.title: Finite State Machine
fsm.desc: A finite state machine that can be used to control a GoPiGo3 robot.

ga.title: Genetic Algorithm
ga.desc: A genetic algorithm used to provide different solutions to common problems

paint.desc: A paint program that allows the user to draw on a canvas anf other simple things.

playerspotify.title: Radiohead Player
playerspotify.desc: A program that allows the user to play Radiohead playlists using the spotify API.

quizspotify.title: Spotify Quiz
quizspotify.desc: A program that allows the user to play a quiz game using the spotify API.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.desc: This website, a portfolio for Jonathan Robinson.

services.title: Services
services.desc: Services page for Jonathan Robinson's portfolio website

confirmationEmail.subject: Thanks for contacting me, please confirm your email address
confirmationEmail.text:
Greetings {{userName}}, 

Thanks for contacting me, please confirm your email address by clicking the link below:

{{link}}

Your email address will be kept for 6 months after your confirmation, the expiration resets at every new daily mail.

If you did not request this email, please ignore it.

Thanks,
Jonathan Robinson

thankyouEmail.subject: {{name}}, I have received your message
thankyouEmail.text:
Greetings {{name}}, 

Thanks for contacting me, I will get back to you as soon as possible.

Thanks,
Jonathan Robinson
